hero.title: Online Gift Vouchers for Your Thai Massage Business
hero.text: People buy them from your website, get them delivered to their inbox, and you never have to lift a finger. Works while you're busy, works while you're closed, even works while you're on holiday.
hero.imageAlt: Digital gift voucher on mobile device

items.title: Money Coming In While You Rest
items.text: Someone buys a voucher from your website while you're asleep, or having dinner, or just done for the day. You check your phone the next morning and there's a payment sitting there. Christmas, Mother's Day, birthdays. All those gift-giving moments where people need something last-minute. Your shop doesn't need to be open for any of it.

items.title: Paid Now, Work Later
items.text: You get the cash when they buy, but the massage might not happen for weeks. Maybe even months. That money sits in your account right now, covering rent during January when nobody wants to leave the house, or keeping things steady through those random quiet patches every business gets. Bills don't wait for customers to show up. Having voucher money already banked takes a lot of the stress out of slower periods.

items.title: No Tracking Nightmares
items.text: Anyone who's done vouchers manually knows it's a mess. Who bought what? Has this one been used? Is that code even valid? You're digging through notebooks or old emails trying to piece it together. The system handles all of that for you automatically, so nothing slips through and you're not second-guessing yourself every time someone walks in with a piece of paper.

I never thought about selling vouchers before, but Kris showed me how easy it is. Now I see people buying them for birthdays and gifts even when I’m closed. It is a great way to make some extra money. I’m very happy I tried it.

features.title: Everything's Already in There
features.text: Complete system, ready to go. No setup fees, no monthly extras.

items.title: Instant Delivery
items.text: Someone buys a voucher, it hits the recipient's inbox within seconds. Perfect for the last-minute gift buyers.

items.title: Your Branding Throughout
items.text: Your logo, your colours, your design. Every voucher looks like it came from your business, because it did. Professional and polished, never some generic template.

items.title: Flexible Options
items.text: Sell £50 or £100 vouchers, or tie them to specific treatments like a 90-minute massage or couples package.

items.title: Automatic Tracking
items.text: Expiry dates, redemption status, unique codes. The system watches all of it. No duplicates getting through, no expired vouchers being accepted, no awkward conversations.

items.title: Split Across Visits
items.text: Someone has a £100 voucher but only wants a £40 treatment today? No problem. The system keeps track of what's left and brings them back again, which is never a bad thing.

items.title: Easy Redemption
items.text: Scan a QR code with any phone and it's done. You won't have to type long codes or flip through records. It takes about two seconds.
